<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_70281_covid_trac_data_points</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Bring data from REST endpoint</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	
	try {

		// Start Asynchronously: Uncomment to run in background. Code snippet will not have access to outputs.
		// sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().action('x_70281_covid_trac.bring_all_data_to_datapoint').inBackground().run();
				
		// Execute Synchronously: Run in foreground. Code snippet has access to outputs.
		var result = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().action('x_70281_covid_trac.bring_all_data_to_datapoint').inForeground().run();
		var outputs = result.getOutputs();

		// Get Outputs:
		// Note: outputs can only be retrieved when executing synchronously.
		var result = outputs['result']; // Object
		
	} catch (ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
		gs.error(message);
	}
	
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>niamul.arifin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-24 23:01:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>53d6c8651bd16010e33e7596cc4bcb48</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Bring data from REST endpoint</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CoVID Tracker" source="x_70281_covid_trac">d7c681ff1be82010e33e7596cc4bcb7a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CoVID Tracker">d7c681ff1be82010e33e7596cc4bcb7a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_53d6c8651bd16010e33e7596cc4bcb48</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>niamul.arifin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-24 23:03:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=53d6c8651bd16010e33e7596cc4bcb48"/></record_update>
